publicationStmt.publisher: In fletestrete at the sygne of the sonne by Wynkyn de Worde,
publicationStmt.date: The yere of our lorde. M.D.XXI. [1521]]

notesStmt.note: Last leaf of a publication of unknown extent. Title from title of carol on recto.
Not the same collection as any of STC 5204.3-5205.
Imprint from colophon, which begins: Thus endeth the Christmasse carolles, newely enprinted ..
Includes "A caroll of huntynge" and "A caroll bringyng in the bores heed".
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
